header.title: Jesktop.net - Free/Open Applications
header.subtitle: JarUtil
header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: JarUtil
s1.p: Rana Bhattacharyya designated the source as APL so that we may support it as a built in application. It is a WinZip replacement, though a bit simpler for now. This is the start of something great. Rana is on the team building other things for Jesktop and just as exitingly Avalon (he's making a FTP server for it).

s1.title: License
s1.p: JarUtil is licensed under Apache license.
